# fillColor

**Type Property**

A key that contains the behavior to use when filling the empty space around the image.

## Declaration

```swift
static let fillColor: NSWorkspace.DesktopImageOptionKey
```

## Discussion

The value is the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor] object to use when filling any empty space around the image. If you don’t specify this key, the workspace object uses a default color. Currently, the system supports only colors that use or can be converted to use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorSpaceName/calibratedRGB] color space. The system also ignores any alpha value in the color you specify.

## Option Keys

- **imageScaling**: A key that contains the behavior to use when scaling the image.
- **allowClipping**: A key that contains the behavior to use when clipping the image.
